message.content:
cs.CR, cs.SI, cs.NI, cs.HC, cs.DC

Reasoning: 
- cs.CR (Cryptography and Security) is the most likely category as the paper proposes a system for emergency rescue and alert management service to prevent and deter crime on school and college campuses. 
- cs.SI (Social and Information Networks) is also likely as the proposed system relies on proximity-enabled trust and cooperation among mobile users on campus. 
- cs.NI (Networking and Internet Architecture) is relevant as the system uses Bluetooth and/or WiFi to achieve minimal response time and maximal availability. 
- cs.HC (Human-Computer Interaction) is relevant as the paper discusses the implementation of a prototype application to be used in emergency scenarios. 
- cs.DC (Distributed, Parallel, and Cluster Computing) is less likely but still possible as the proposed system is fully distributed and infrastructure-less.
